item.title: Extremely vulnerable person's service: guidance on the data
item.description: Contents Introduction Daily incoming data NHS Shielded patient data Wholesaler food delivery data Contact us Contact us Email transfer-coronavirus-data-service@digital.cabinet-office.gov.uk with specific questions about the data. Email shielding@communities.gov.uk with questions about policy and the overall process, such as questions about the food parcels. If you want to get involved in the service more generally, you can join the conversation on the LocalGov Digital Slack channel #coronavirus-vulnerable-people-service. If you don’t have access to localgovdigital.

item.title: Extremely vulnerable person's service: guidance on the data
item.description: Contents Introduction Daily incoming data NHS Shielded patient data Wholesaler food delivery data Contact us Daily incoming data on extremely vulnerable people who have applied for support This is the data on people who have applied for support via the clinically extremely vulnerable person’s service, through the GOV.UK form or phone line. A new file is added to each hub’s GOV.​UK transfer data account every day at 4pm.

item.title: Extremely vulnerable person's service: guidance on the data
item.description: Contents Introduction Daily incoming data NHS Shielded patient data Wholesaler food delivery data More information about the process Contact us More information about the process Previous : Wholesaler food delivery data Next : Contact us

item.title: Extremely vulnerable person's service: guidance on the data
item.description: Contents Introduction Daily incoming data NHS Shielded patient data Wholesaler food delivery data Contact us NHS shielding patient data There are currently 2 files of NHS patient data. Local authority hubs can access these on their GOV.​UK transfer data account. Hubs should share the relevant cuts of data with local authorities within their hub. The first file was released on 2 April. It is the data on the original ~900k people the NHS deemed extremely vulnerable and contacted, advising them to apply for support.

item.title: Extremely vulnerable person's service: guidance on the data
item.description: Contents Introduction Daily incoming data NHS Shielded patient data Wholesaler food delivery data Contact us Wholesaler food delivery data This is the information from wholesalers (Brakes and Bidfood) about upcoming deliveries and the status of completed or attempted deliveries. Local authority hubs should have been emailed a link to a secure online folder (URL beginning with “micollab.joinedupdclg.net”). In this folder are 2 files for each local authority within a hub:
